About Myself

I am a Quality Engineer by profession with expertise in developing custom open source solutions for complex test automation problems. I have worn many feathers in 12+ years of my career including Test Automation Training, Manager, Lead, Speaker and Developer.

I identify myself as self proclaimed test evangelist. Big Jagjeet Singh fan and Sucker for Queen songs, lover of south indian food. Unorganized knowledge of trivia.

Opinionated | He / Him | Moderate | Temperate | Mister Fahrenheit

anecdotes

AI to test and recommend image alt text for visual accessibility

Verifying the alt text for an image is a unique chalange for automation tools.

While it is easier to validate the Alt Text manually but until now it was almost impossible to verify the Validity of alt text of an image. The text could be plain wrong or may not be best representation of the imange contextually. Below is a possible solution of how to use AI for this task.

Nov 15 2018

Adaptive Framework : Cucumber Test Integration with JIRA

JIRA Adaptive framework intends to automate not just the test cases / Acceptance Criteria but it is also a great way to automate testing itself.

The test suites are picked automatically for a sprint and are executed. Tests and the Related stories are failed or passed and appropriate comment along with screenshots are posted.
